articles.description: All the latest transfer news as Manchester United and Newcastle bid for RB Leipzig's Benjamin Sesko.

articles.description: As Louis Rees-Zammit becomes the latest 'crossover athlete' unable to make the NFL transition, BBC Sport looks at why it's so hard to break through.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Why is NFL transition so hard to accomplish?

articles.description: The BBC talks to Sheffield Wednesday fans to understand how they are being affected by the Championship club's financial turmoil.
articles.title: Sheffield Wednesday financial crisis: Fans tell BBC how they are impacted

articles.title: McLaren boss Zak Brown says Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri will 'not properly fall out' in bid for F1 title

articles.title: Sarah Calvert: Meet the medicine student who stunned Laura Muir

articles.description: With Leicester spending the 10-year anniversary of their Premier League title win in England's second tier, BBC Sport looks at how the highs turned so low.
articles.title: Leicester City: How Foxes went from Premier League champions to yo-yo club

articles.description: The much-anticipated rematch between British rivals Chris Eubank Jr and Conor Benn will take place at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in November.
articles.title: Chris Eubank Jr v Conor Benn rematch announced for 15 November

articles.description: From bringing back the Rory Delap long throw to beating the offside trap - how throw-ins can help teams gain a tactical edge.

articles.description: An unnamed former county cricket coach is suspended from the sport for nine months after admitting charges of sexual misconduct.

articles.description: Clara Tauson dedicated her victory to her recently deceased grandfather as she reached the semi-finals of the Canadian open by beating American Madison Keys 6-1 6-4 on Tuesday.
articles.title: Clara Tauson defeats Madison Keys to set up Canadian Open semi-final with Naomi Osaka
